entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid's voice rang out, saying, 'Back, Fang â€“ back.' Hagrid's big hairy face appeared in the crack as he pulled the door open.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang was clearly not as fierce as he looked. Fang bounded straight at Ron and started licking his ears.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry told Hagrid, 'This is Ron,' Harry told Hagrid, who was pouring boiling water into a large teapot and putting rock cakes on to a plate.

entities.name: forest
entities.description: Hagrid spent half me life chasin' yer twin brothers away from the Forest.

relationships.description: He let them in, struggling to keep a hold on the collar of an enormous black boarhound.
